data.message: And of course the only people to respond to this would be the negative haters out there in the world who seem to judge everybody before judging themselves

replies.message: no, some of us just like to argue
Obviously.... Let people do what they want, it's not your life, not your decisions, so let people be free to explore.
So you must be a  judgmental hater... Unless you didn't respond?

No, but the people who were replying when this first went live, where nothing but people who had hate filled comments. not "haters" in the sense of not agreeing or anything, haters as in they were literally filled with hate, and posting nothing but hate filled comments. As you can see, that post is over 2 hours old, I posted that when this thing first started, and that's all that was happening.

no offense to Gay people... but lets face the truth,a time will come when there would be no babe's as in the human race would be terminated in future...... AN EVER WONDER WHAT WOULD HAVE HAPPEN IF ALL THE ANIMAL IN THE WORLD WOULD HAVE TURNED GAY TOO(perfect example of the dinosaur's) ...??? think people think..... don't blame one another..... THE WORLD WILL END an u all would be happy an gay about it ....
